name: newRoute
description: Create a new route from the route input and its ID

children.name: ev
children.description: EV specific data for a route request

children.name: id
children.description: Internal ID of a Car

children.name: battery
children.description: The EV battery specific data

children.name: capacity
children.description: Usable capacity of a battery used to compute a route. Allowed value is between -50% and 50% of the car usable battery capacity. If this in not filled in, we assume it is the same value as the car batteryUsableKwh.

children.name: value
children.description: Value of a desired final amount of energy in a battery

children.name: type
children.description: Type of a desired final amount of energy in a battery

children.name: stateOfCharge
children.description: Current amount of energy in a battery. If this is not filled in, we assume the battery is full and we fill it in with car batteryUsableKwh.

children.name: value
children.description: Value of a desired final amount of energy in a battery

children.name: type
children.description: Type of a desired final amount of energy in a battery

children.name: finalStateOfCharge
children.description: Desired final amount of energy in a battery. If this is not filled in, we assume it is 20% of the car batteryUsableKwh.

children.name: value
children.description: Value of a desired final amount of energy in a battery

children.name: type
children.description: Type of a desired final amount of energy in a battery

children.name: plugs
children.description: Supported plugs of an EV

children.name: standard
children.description: Type of a plug

children.name: CHADEMO
children.description: The connector type is CHAdeMO, DC

children.name: DOMESTIC_A
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "A", NEMA 1-15, 2 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_B

children.name: DOMESTIC_E
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "E", CEE 7/5 3 pins

children.name: chargingPower
children.description: Maximum charging speed for this plug

children.name: minPower
children.description: Minimum desired power of chargers

children.name: climate
children.description: Flag which indicates if the climate is on. The default is true

children.name: occupants
children.description: Number of occupants

children.name: consumption
children.description: Consumption specific to the EV or inputted by the request

children.name: aux
children.description: Consumption, in kWh, of the auxiliaries

children.name: worst
children.description: Worst conditions are based on -10°C and use of heating

children.name: best
children.description: Best conditions are based on 23°C and no use of A/C

children.name: bms
children.description: Consumption, in kWh, of the battery management system

children.name: worst
children.description: Worst conditions are based on -10°C and use of heating

children.name: best
children.description: Best conditions are based on 23°C and no use of A/C

children.name: idle
children.description: Consumption, in kWh, of the car in idle mode

children.name: worst
children.description: Worst conditions are based on -10°C and use of heating

children.name: best
children.description: Best conditions are based on 23°C and no use of A/C

children.name: auxConsumption
children.description: Deprecated

children.name: bmsConsumption
children.description: Deprecated

children.name: routeRequest
children.description: Route request data

children.name: amenities
children.description: A list of desired amenities near the stations, with a 1 km radius

children.name: operatorIds
children.description: Deprecated: in favor of operators. A list of requested operators

children.name: operatorRequired
children.description: Deprecated: in favor of operators. Flag which indicates if the operators are required

children.name: operatorPrefer
children.description: Deprecated: in favor of operators. Flag which indicates if the preferred operators should be loaded

children.name: operators
children.description: Operator prioritization for a route

children.name: type
children.description: Flag indicating if the operators ranking should be preferred or required

children.name: none
children.description: Default option. Operators ranking will not be taken into account if no type is given

children.name: preferred
children.description: Operators given in the operators ranking will be preferred when calculating routes

children.name: required
children.description: Operators given in the operators ranking will be required when calculating routes, all other operators will be ignored

children.name: ranking
children.description: Ranking of an operator with multiple levels, each level having it's own penalty value

children.name: level1
children.description: Level 1 (most significant) for operator ranking

children.name: level2
children.description: Level 2 for operator ranking

children.name: level3
children.description: Level 3 for operator ranking

children.name: level4
children.description: Level 4 for operator ranking

children.name: level5
children.description: Level 5 for operator ranking

children.name: level6
children.description: Level 6 for operator ranking

children.name: level7
children.description: Level 7 for operator ranking

children.name: level8
children.description: Level 8 for operator ranking

children.name: level9
children.description: Level 9 for operator ranking

children.name: level10
children.description: Level 10 (least significant) for operator ranking

children.name: exclude
children.description: Operator IDs which should be excluded from a route

children.name: season
children.description: Optional flag to specify the season

children.name: summer
children.description: We suppose it is summer and we have the best weather conditions

children.name: winter
children.description: We suppose it is winter and we have the worst weather conditions

children.name: current
children.description: We fetch the current weather conditions

children.name: safeRiskMargin
children.description: Percentage for a minimum limit of a battery capacity before a recharge. The value should be between 0 and 60, with a default of 10%

children.name: chargeMode
children.description: Mode that indicates if we optimize the charging time or always charge to the maximum capacity

children.name: OPTIMIZE_TRAVEL_TIME
children.description: Optimizes the charging time at each station, in order to decrease the total travel time. You will only charge up until the SOC you need in order to reach the next stop

children.name: ALWAYS_TO_MAX_CHARGE
children.description: Charge to the maximum capacity at every charging stop. The default maximum charging capacity is 80%

children.name: origin
children.description: Origin of a route

children.name: id
children.description: The feature ID

children.name: type
children.description: Feature type

children.name: geometry
children.description: Geometry of the feature

children.name: type
children.description: Point type

children.name: coordinates
children.description: Coordinates [longitude, latitude]

children.name: properties
children.description: Optional object where you can store custom data you need in your application. This extends the current functionalities we offer

children.name: destination
children.description: Destination of a route

children.name: id
children.description: The feature ID

children.name: type
children.description: Feature type

children.name: geometry
children.description: Geometry of the feature

children.name: type
children.description: Point type

children.name: coordinates
children.description: Coordinates [longitude, latitude]

children.name: properties
children.description: Optional object where you can store custom data you need in your application. This extends the current functionalities we offer

children.name: via
children.description: An optional list of locations where we should stop

children.name: id
children.description: The feature ID

children.name: type
children.description: Feature type

children.name: geometry
children.description: Geometry of the feature

children.name: type
children.description: Point type

children.name: coordinates
children.description: Coordinates [longitude, latitude]

children.name: properties
children.description: Optional object where you can store custom data you need in your application. This extends the current functionalities we offer

children.name: stationsAlongRouteRadius
children.description: Alternative stations along a route within a specified radius in meters (minimum 500, maximum 5000)

children.name: instructions
children.description: Deprecated: all routes will have turn-by-turn instructions prepared. Boolean will be ignored
